Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to the Kerbal Minds Corperation! Here we focus on doing what is needed to change Kerbals forever. We pledge to go everywhere and do everything needing to be done. So if you want to join up as any of the roles below, I'll more than happy to check your application.

Jobs:

-Artist- Please fix the logo... I made it and it sucks... horribly. Also here is the file so if you want to edit it or look at it for edits your open to.

Link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx7MSvRH-8qdNktTY0duM1QyTDg/edit?usp=sharing

-KMP Server Host-If someone can host a server 24h for people to join, that'll be awesome.

-Battle Strategist- If someone likes to take ships and put them in battle formations and pit them in battle, that's what I need. Also If you can record and edit those battles so I can watch and not have to watch 1hours worth of just setting up that'll be cool (use YT is possible).

-Testers and Builders- If you wish to be either please say and also specify which type of builder/tester you would like to be. I need both AIRCRAFT builders/testers and SPACECRAFT. So please sign up as one of the 4 options.

So we are open to any applicants and would be honored to have you fly for us
